About

I’m a well rounded programmer who loves everything open source. I learned a lot from looking at and making programs inspired by open source technology.

Work Experience

Lead Technology Developer, Aced

August 2015 - Present

I am the lead technology developer at Aced, a group at our school. I’m developing an iOS application and a website using AWS Cognito authentication with Facebook sign-in for multi-device support and other AWS API for database, storage, notification and analytics. I have worked both the front-end and the back-end. Users signup and access it on either iOS app or the website.
